name: Hoovering Halloween
description:
It's Halloween and it's time to go Trick or Treating. Most kids avoid the spooky haunted house at the end of the street, but you know they always give out the most candy (even if it's a bit dusty). Navigate the different rooms by solving puzzles using your mom's vacuum cleaner!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left-Mouse - Use suction mode

Right-Mouse - Use blow mode

Hoovering Halloween is a Puzzle Platformer created for the Becker College October Gam Jam. Our group had 48 hours to create a game with the theme of Trick/Treat.

Credits:

James Nunes - Programming & Design

Nick Rioux - 3D Art & UI

Ben Clingen - Environment Art

Greg Bonini - Music & Sound Effects
